translation.en: Are you hungry, Mr. Harker?
No, I'm-- -I'm fine. -[door opens]
-Thank you. -Then perhaps we can talk.
I'm Sister Agatha.
[Harker] I thought I'd met all the sisters.
translation.es: Creí conocer a todas las hermanas.

translation.en: I have been sequestered.
[Harker] In prayer?
In study, Mr. Harker, of you.
translation.es: - ¿Orando?- Estudiando, Sr. Harker, estudiándolo a usted.

translation.en: I've read your account of your most interesting stay in Transylvania.
translation.es: Leí su relato sobre su interesanteestadía en Transilvania.

translation.en: [Harker] It's the truth.
All of it. [Agatha] And what a lot of truth there is.
Sister Angela tells me you wrote all day and all night for a whole week.
translation.es: La hermana Angela dice que escribiósin parar durante una semana.

translation.en: Please, sit with me.
-Is the sun a little bright for you? -No.
Good.
That's good, isn't it?
Ah, my dear, come in.
We are to be observed.
Apparently, I cannot be trusted alone with a man.
translation.es: Al parecer, no soy de fiarjunto a un hombre a solas.

translation.en: Consider yourself chaperoned.
Mr. Harker, I intend no impertinence, but why are you still alive?
translation.es: Señor Harker, no quiero ser impertinente,pero ¿por qué sigue vivo?

translation.en: I fled. I was trapped. I escaped.
-Escaped, yes. -I fled that place in terror of my life.
translation.es: - Escapó, sí.- Huí aterrorizado de ese lugar.

translation.en: He is a monster.
I swear to you.
He is the Devil himself. Then why have you stopped?
translation.es: - Es el mismísimo diablo.- ¿Y por qué se detuvo?

translation.en: -Stopped what? -Fleeing.
You've been here nearly a month.
I'm safe with you.
This is a house of God. A house of God, is it? [laughs]
translation.es: - Es una casa de Dios.- Una casa de Dios, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, that's good.
We could do with a man about the place, eh, Sister?
translation.es: Nos vendría bien un hombre aquí,¿no, hermana?

translation.en: Two years ago, a church in this town collapsed.
translation.es: Hace dos años, una iglesia local colapsó.

translation.en: The roof fell on the congregation, killed everyone as they prayed,
translation.es: El techo cayó sobre la congregacióny mató a todos,

translation.en: including the children.
The priest was the only survivor. Priests are like that.
translation.es: Solo sobrevivió el sacerdote.Ellos son así.

translation.en: He said to me afterwards that even in moments like these,
translation.es: Luego me dijoque, incluso en momentos así,

translation.en: he was able to maintain his faith.
I told him he should have maintained his roof.
translation.es: Le dije que debió preservar su techo.

translation.en: -[fly buzzing] -Look to your own protection, Mr. Harker.
-God doesn't care. -[Harker scoffs]
The way you talk,
it's unusual in someone of your calling.
translation.es: es inusual en alguien con su vocación.

translation.en: My calling was a very long time ago.
translation.es: Mi vocación murió hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: What's wrong?
You have something in your eye.
Is it gone?
Yes.
Your fiancée, Mina,
you mentioned her a lot when you first arrived. Mina Murray.
translation.es: La mencionó muchocuando llegó. Mina Murray.

translation.en: Oh, uh, yes.
-I need to contact her. -You must love her very much.
Of course.
Perhaps, in time, you will let her read this account.
translation.es: Tal vez en el futuro la deje leer esto.

translation.en: -If she wishes, yes. -So, out of kindness,
translation.es: - Si ella quiere, sí.- Entonces, por amabilidad,

translation.en: you've omitted from your writings anything that would alarm or disturb her?
translation.es: ¿omitió de sus escritosalgo que la alarmara o la molestara?

translation.en: Well, I didn't want to--
So now you may tell me everything
translation.es: Ahora puede contarme todo lo que pasó mientras estuvocon el conde en su castillo.

translation.en: that occurred in the time you spent with the Count at his castle.
translation.es: todo lo que pasó mientras estuvocon el conde en su castillo.

translation.en: Your dinners, your conversations, your intimate moments.
translation.es: Sus cenas, sus conversaciones,sus momentos íntimos.

translation.en: Your life may depend on your complete honesty.
translation.es: Su vida podría dependerde su total honestidad.

translation.en: Do you understand what I'm asking you?
I think so.
I'm asking, Mr. Harker,
if you had sexual intercourse with Count Dracula.
translation.es: si tuvo relaciones sexualescon el conde Drácula.

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Harker.
Mr. Harker, please.
You must take this.
That's very kind of you, thank you.
-I couldn't possibly. -You must.
-Thank you. -[woman] You will need this.
[Harker] Driver,
I'm sorry, but we still seem to be some distance from the castle.
translation.es: disculpe, pero aún estamoslejos del castillo.

translation.en: [driver] It's as close as we are going.
-The Count will find you here. -How?
He finds people.
He will send his driver.
[woman] My darling Johnny...
[woman] You are to travel to a distant land,
translation.es: vas a viajar a una tierra remota

translation.en: and I shall miss you very much every single day.
translation.es: y te extrañaré mucho cada día que pase.

translation.en: It seems to me likely that you will meet some very exciting women
as you travel across Europe to Transylvania,
translation.es: en tu viaje por Europa hasta Transilvania,

translation.en: and I wanted to assure you that, should you fall prey to temptation,
translation.es: y quería asegurarteque, si caes en la tentación,

translation.en: I, as your dutiful fiancée, will completely understand.
translation.es: yo, como tu devota prometida,lo entenderé por completo.

translation.en: The certainty of our coming wedding
translation.es: La certeza de nuestra próxima boda

translation.en: is all the consolation a young woman could require.
translation.es: es todo el consueloque una joven necesita.

translation.en: Well, apart from the very handsome Doctor Holmwood,
translation.es: Bueno, aparte del apuesto doctor Holmwood,

translation.en: your friends Reggie and Barnaby who always seem so pleased to see me,
translation.es: tus amigos Reggie y Barnaby,que siempre son amables conmigo,

translation.en: lovely Edwin from your office,
translation.es: el encantador Edwin de tu oficina,

translation.en: the butcher's boy who has filled out quite deliciously in recent months,
translation.es: el joven carniceroque ha engordado en estos meses

translation.en: and should I want for variety,
the adorable barmaid at the Rose and Crown,
translation.es: la adorable camarera del Rose and Crown,

translation.en: who I know you have also admired.
translation.es: a quien sé que también admirabas.

translation.en: I feel certain we shall be mindful
of each other at all times during our separation.
translation.es: el uno en el otrodurante nuestra separación.

translation.en: All my love and, I hope, all yours, your adoring Mina.
translation.es: Todo mi amor y, espero, todo el tuyo,tu adorada Mina".

translation.en: Actually, driver, could you help me with my cases?
Charming.
Hello?
Hello? [echoes]
[Harker] Anyone at home?
Hello?
[stammers] I'm sorry. I...
The wine was open, I assumed...
Perhaps I could pour you some, Count?
I do not drink...
wine.
I bid you welcome, Mr. Harker.
translation.es: Le doy la bienvenida, Sr. Harker.

translation.en: I am...
Dracula.
Your employer speaks highly of you, Mr. Harker.
translation.es: Su empleador hablamuy bien de usted, Sr. Harker.

translation.en: Yes. The property has been purchased in your name.
translation.es: Sí. La propiedad se compró a su nombre.

translation.en: -Everything is in order. -[grunts]
[Harker] I need only your signature on a few documents,
and Carfax Abbey will be yours.
I am looking forward to England, Mr. Harker.
translation.es: Estoy ansioso por ira Inglaterra, Sr. Harker.

translation.en: People here, they are so narrow.
translation.es: La gente aquí es muy cerrada.

translation.en: I wither among them.
They are without...
They are without flavor.
Perhaps you mean "character"?
Perhaps.
This is good, Mr. Harker.
You must correct my English at all times.
translation.es: Quiero que corrija mi ingléstodo el tiempo.

translation.en: From you, I shall learn to pass among your countrymen
translation.es: Por usted, aprenderé a pasarentre sus compatriotas

translation.en: as one of their own.
Your English is already excellent, Count.
translation.es: Su inglés ya es excelente, conde.

translation.en: You flatter me.
No, I don't.
However, I'm afraid I will be leaving here tomorrow.
translation.es: Sin embargo, me temoque me marcharé mañana.

translation.en: I have to return to England immediately.
translation.es: Debo regresar a Inglaterra de inmediato.

translation.en: Sorry?
Your apology is unnecessary.
translation.es: No es necesario que se disculpe.

translation.en: You are staying.
-It has already been agreed. -With whom?
Your superiors.
You will remain with me for one month
translation.es: Se quedará conmigo durante un mes

translation.en: and assist me with my English and my understanding of your culture.
translation.es: para ayudarme a mejorar mi inglésy a entender su cultura.

translation.en: -But, Count, I-- -Do not-- No, please.
translation.es: - Pero, conde, yo...- No, por favor.

translation.en: Do not look so concerned, Mr. Harker.
translation.es: No se preocupe tanto, Sr. Harker.

translation.en: You are most welcome.
Count... Count Dracula, I'm a lawyer,
I'm not a teacher.
There will be no need to teach.
Simply remain at my side, and I shall...
translation.es: Solo estará a mi lado y yo...

translation.en: absorb you.
[Agatha] That word...
"absorb," he said that?
Yes.
"Absorb."
[Dracula] Please, pay close attention.
You will not find my home easy to navigate.
translation.es: No le resultará fácildesplazarse por mi hogar.

translation.en: It is a rising labyrinth of stairs and doors and shadows.
translation.es: Es un laberinto ascendentede escaleras, puertas y sombras.

translation.en: Yes, quite remarkable.
-One would almost need a map. -There is no map of my castle.
translation.es: - Casi necesitaría un mapa.- No hay mapas de mi castillo.

translation.en: No complete design was ever committed to paper.
translation.es: Ningún diseño completoquedó plasmado en papel.

translation.en: It is said many souls are lost in the tangle of the corridors.
translation.es: Se dice que hay muchas almas perdidasentre el caos de los corredores.

translation.en: The prison without locks.
Perhaps you have heard of the architect, Petruvio the Widower?
translation.es: ¿Tal vez haya oído hablar del arquitecto,Petruvio el Viudo?

translation.en: -No. -This castle was the widower's final work.
translation.es: - No.- Este castillo fue su obra final.

translation.en: A monument to his lost love and the sunlight
translation.es: Un monumento a su amor perdidoy a la luz del sol

translation.en: to which he could never return.
translation.es: que nunca pudo volver a ver.

translation.en: Legend has it
that he died here
in the arms of his wife.
translation.es: en los brazos de su esposa.

translation.en: If he was a widower, surely she died before him.
translation.es: Si era viudo,seguramente ella murió antes que él.

translation.en: It must have been a cold embrace.
translation.es: Debe haber sido un gélido abrazo.

translation.en: Do not be impatient with those sweet little things.
translation.es: No pierda la pacienciacon esas adorables criaturitas.

translation.en: They are man's companion to the end and beyond.
translation.es: Son las compañeras del hombre hasta el final y más allá.

translation.en: Where there is flesh,
there are flies.
In the morning, you will find the sunlight will be streaming
translation.es: En la mañana, la luz del sol entrará

translation.en: through this window.
Fortunately the drapes are very thick.
[Dracula] Please excuse the absence of my staff.
translation.es: Disculpe la ausencia de mi personal.

translation.en: They are not here at night.
translation.es: No están aquí por las noches.

translation.en: Forgive me. I am clumsy.
Of course, Count,
though perhaps you could lend me a replacement.
I am afraid I do not possess such a thing.
translation.es: Me temo que no poseo tal cosa.

translation.en: -You don't have any mirrors? -[sighs]
Baubles of vanity.
What is the purpose of a mirror?
One will find no enlightenment in one's own gaze.
translation.es: No encontrará la iluminaciónen su propio reflejo.

translation.en: Are you all right, Mr. Harker?
Oh, I'm fine. It's, uh...
-just a scratch. -Please be careful.
translation.es: - Solo es un rasguño.- Por favor, tenga cuidado.

translation.en: We cannot return you in any way damaged
to your beautiful Mina.
translation.es: a los brazos de su hermosa Mina.

translation.en: It's nothing, it's just--
Did I mention Mina?
I think you spoke of her beauty at dinner.
translation.es: Creo que habló de su belleza en la cena.

translation.en: don't recall that.
Perhaps it was the wine.
No, I barely drank.
My sympathies.
Please, attend to your hand.
It's really fine. It's nothing.
translation.es: No se preocupe. No es nada.

translation.en: Blood is not nothing.
Blood is lives. [Agatha] Lives?
You are quite certain he did not say, "Blood is life"?
translation.es: ¿Seguro que no dijo "la sangre es vida"?

translation.en: -He said, "Blood is lives"? -He did.
Yes.
It struck me as odd.
But there were other oddnesses that preoccupied you?
translation.es: Pero había otras rarezasque le preocupaban más.

translation.en: How could he know my thoughts?
I never mentioned Mina at dinner.
translation.es: Nunca mencioné a Mina en la cena.

translation.en: I'm certain of it.
A dog can sniff stories on the slightest breeze, while we are blind in the wind.
translation.es: Un perro olfatea historias con la másligera brisa, a diferencia de nosotros.

translation.en: He could smell my thoughts in the air?
No, Mr. Harker, that would be ridiculous.
translation.es: No, Sr. Harker, eso sería ridículo.

translation.en: But perhaps in your blood.
Perhaps stories flow in our veins if you know how to read them.
translation.es: Quizá hay historias en nuestras venas,si sabemos leerlas.

translation.en: Blood is lives.
You will not see me till tomorrow evening. I have, uh, several appointments.
translation.es: No me verá hasta mañana por la noche.Tengo algunas citas.

translation.en: Till then, please treat my home as your own.
translation.es: Hasta entonces,por favor, siéntase como en su casa.

translation.en: I bid you good night.
Good night--
Is someone-- [yells]
Hello?
Hello?
So, there was another guest in the castle?
Perhaps also a prisoner.
[Harker] I didn't realize I was a prisoner at the time.
translation.es: No sabía que yo era prisionero aún.

translation.en: That night, then?
-I slept. -You dreamed?
I woke early.
No, wait. You dreamed.
After a day of such incident and color, how could you not?
translation.es: Después de un día tan singular,¿cómo no soñar?

translation.en: [Agatha] Was it Mina you dreamed of?
You longed for her.
One longs for the solace of home.
translation.es: Uno ansía el consuelo de su hogar.

translation.en: [Agatha] One longs, certainly.
Tell me more about your dream.
It is private.
[Agatha] You ache for her.
You were together in your dream. I don't see-- This is not--
translation.es: - Estaban juntos en su sueño.- Yo no... Esto no es...

translation.en: [Agatha] There is no shame in it.
translation.es: No hay nada de qué avergonzarse.

translation.en: Dreams are a haven where we sin without consequence.
translation.es: Los sueños son un refugio donde pecamossin consecuencias.

translation.en: Believe me, I know.
Some mornings, I can hardly look Sister Rosa in the face.
translation.es: Hay mañanas en que no puedo mirara la hermana Rosa a la cara.

translation.en: What you asked before, if I'd ever--
translation.es: Su pregunta de antes, - si había...- Si tuvo sexo con el conde Drácula.

translation.en: If you'd ever had sexual intercourse with Count Dracula.
translation.es: - si había...- Si tuvo sexo con el conde Drácula.

translation.en: Why did you ask that?
Clearly you have been contaminated with something.
translation.es: Es evidente que algo lo contaminó.

translation.en: Any contact you've had with Count Dracula,
translation.es: Todo contacto que haya tenidocon el conde,

translation.en: sexual or otherwise,
is therefore relevant.
[Agatha] Continue.
"Help us."
[Agatha] So, it struck you as strange, of course.
translation.es: Eso le pareció extraño, por supuesto.

translation.en: [Harker] Well, clearly, there was someone trapped in the castle.
translation.es: Claramente, había alguien atrapadoen el castillo.

translation.en: [Agatha] No. No, the writing. "Help us."
It was upside down.
[Agatha] Yes, of course, because whoever wrote it was obliged to hang that way.
translation.es: Sí, claro, porque quien lo escribiódebió estar colgando.

translation.en: But even that extraordinary physical feat is surely not the point of interest.
translation.es: Pero ni siquiera esa extraordinariahazaña física es lo más interesante.

translation.en: Then what is?
What is remarkable, Mr. Harker...
what is convenient is that the words were in English.
translation.es: ...es lo oportuno del mensajeescrito en inglés.

translation.en: I didn't think of that.
translation.es: - No pensé en eso.- Claro que no.

translation.en: Of course not. You are an Englishman:
translation.es: - No pensé en eso.- Claro que no. Usted es inglés,

translation.en: a combination of presumptions beyond compare.
translation.es: una combinación de presunciones sin igual.

translation.en: Proceed.
[Harker] I knew I had the day to myself,
translation.es: Sabía que tenía todo el día para mí,

translation.en: so I determined to find the room above mine
translation.es: así que decidí buscar esa habitación

translation.en: and see if anyone required my assistance.
translation.es: y ver si alguien necesitaba ayuda.

translation.en: [Agatha] Tell me.
How did you feel?
[Harker] Different, older.
But very curious. At least I knew I was not alone.
translation.es: Pero muy curioso.Al menos sabía que no estaba solo.

translation.en: The Count hadn't been exaggerating about his castle.
translation.es: El conde no exageraba sobre su castillo.

translation.en: Hello?
Whatever way I turned,
it never took me where I expected.
translation.es: siempre llegaba a un lugar inesperado.

translation.en: Every door I opened led to two more, and then three.
translation.es: Tras cada puerta se abríandos puertas más y luego otras tres.

translation.en: Every step I took,
I made the wrong choice.
I was lost in the architect's labyrinth.
translation.es: Estaba perdido en el laberintodel arquitecto.

translation.en: I wasted most of the day
until I found myself too tired to go on.
translation.es: hasta que el cansancio me impidió seguir.

translation.en: [Dracula] Sorry, didn't mean to startle you.
I think you've been working too hard.
Count. [Dracula] Please, relax.
Have a glass of wine.
Your voice...
you sound different.
[Dracula] I've been working on my English.
-Ah... -[Dracula] Do you approve?
It's almost perfect.
[Dracula] The credit is all yours.
translation.es: Todo se lo debo a usted.

translation.en: Your presence has invigorated me.
Fresh blood.
[Harker] "Help us."
Hello?
Hello?
Hello? Excuse me?
Please, I intend you no harm.
translation.es: Por favor, no te haré daño.

translation.en: However fleeting the sight,
translation.es: Por fugaz que fuera lo que vi,

translation.en: surely this was proof that I wasn't going mad.
translation.es: era la pruebade que no me estaba volviendo loco.

translation.en: [Harker] Count Dracula?
Are we alone in this castle?
Yes.
Except for the servants, of course.
-I never see any servants. -They aren't here at nights.
translation.es: - Nunca veo sirvientes.- No están aquí por las noches.

translation.en: I don't see them in the daytime either.
translation.es: Tampoco los veo durante el día.

translation.en: In fact,
apart from the driver,
I haven't seen anyone working here at all.
translation.es: nunca he visto a nadie trabajando aquí.

translation.en: Ah, yes, the driver.
[Harker] What I'm asking is,
aside from yourself,
is there anyone living in this castle?
there's no one living here.
[Agatha] So after sundown each day,
translation.es: Día a día, después del atardecer,

translation.en: Dracula appeared stronger and younger,
translation.es: Drácula se veía más joven y fuerte

translation.en: while the opposite was true for you.
translation.es: y a usted le sucedía lo contrario.

translation.en: Did you understand what was happening to you?
No, not then. I thought I was sick, just...
translation.es: No en ese momento.Pensé que estaba enfermo...

translation.en: sick.
Turn your head to the side.
translation.es: Gire la cabeza a un costado.

translation.en: Why?
Show me.
You have been very strong, Mr. Harker.
translation.es: Ha sido muy fuerte, Sr. Harker.

translation.en: In your circumstances, I don't think I could have been half so brave.
translation.es: En su lugar,dudo que yo habría sido tan valiente.

translation.en: I wasn't brave. In what way was I brave?
translation.es: No fui valiente.¿Por qué habla de valentía?

translation.en: [Sister] You were trapped in that place. You were afraid,
translation.es: Usted estaba atrapadoen ese lugar. Tenía miedo,

translation.en: and yet you spent your days searching the castle
translation.es: pero pasaba sus díasrecorriendo el castillo

translation.en: because you thought someone needed your help.
translation.es: porque creía que alguien lo necesitaba.

translation.en: Well, my help had been requested. It...
It would have been difficult to refuse that.
Difficult?
Unacceptable.
So, your search continued.
Tell us.
[Harker] My every exploration led me deeper and deeper into the labyrinth.
translation.es: Con cada exploración me adentrabamás y más en el laberinto.

translation.en: Eventually, I made a remarkable discovery.
What had become of these people?
Were they my predecessors?
It's all I remember.
I fear I may have passed out.
Quite understandable.
"Omoară-ma."
Do you know what that is?
It sounded like a curse.
It's Romanian.
It means "kill me."
[Harker] They looked dead already.
Dead and walking.
[Agatha] Undead.
Tell me.
There is a contagion,
a corruption passing through this world from one sufferer to the next.
translation.es: una peste que se propaga por el mundode un enfermo a otro.

translation.en: For those unfortunates who fall victim to it,
translation.es: Para los desdichados que se contagian,

translation.en: life becomes incurable.
translation.es: la vida se vuelve un mal incurable.

translation.en: They lose the divine ability to die.
translation.es: Pierden la facultad divina de morir.

translation.en: As their bodies rot, their consciousness persists.
translation.es: Sus cuerpos se pudren,pero su conciencia persiste.

translation.en: Even as dust, their pain goes on.
It is a secret every gravedigger keeps.
translation.es: Es un secreto que todo sepulturero guarda.

translation.en: There are those among us
destined to scratch at our coffin lids for all eternity.
translation.es: Algunos estamos destinados a arañar la tapa de nuestro ataúd eternamente.

translation.en: If you work among the dead, it's not death you fear,
translation.es: Si trabajas entre los muertos,no es la muerte lo que temes,

translation.en: it's the alternative.
Is there any salvation for such creatures?
-[Agatha] I don't know. -Have faith!
Faith is a sleeping draught for children and simpletons.
translation.es: La fe es un somníferopara niños y simplones.

translation.en: What we must have...
is a plan.
[Harker] Dracula's one of them, isn't he?
Undead?
Undead, certainly, but from your account, I think he's much more complicated.
translation.es: No muerto, sí, pero a juzgarpor su relato, es mucho más complicado.

translation.en: [Dracula] Johnny, there you are.
I thought we'd lost you.
[groans] What am I doing here?
Well, I found you downstairs, asleep on the floor.
translation.es: Te encontré dormido en el piso del sótano.

translation.en: I could be wrong, but I think you were having a nightmare.
translation.es: Quizá me equivoque,pero creo que tenías pesadillas.

translation.en: You do look rather pale.
You said you didn't drink.
Wine. Now... [clears throat] ...listen,
I need you to do something.
Now, sit yourself down. There you go. That's the ticket.
translation.es: Toma asiento. Eso es. Muy bien. Ahora toma esto.

translation.en: Now, take this.
I need you to write three letters.
What was that?
-That's nothing. -It sounded like a baby.
translation.es: - No es nada.- Parecía un bebé.

translation.en: [chuckles] No, no, no. There's no baby. Now, Johnny, concentrate. Three letters.
translation.es: No, no hay ningún bebé.Johnny, concéntrate. Tres cartas.

translation.en: No one calls me Johnny.
No one? No one.
Company for you while you work.
Who is she?
Don't you recognize her?
Why would I?
I took it from your room. It's Mina, your fiancée.
translation.es: Lo traje de tu habitación.Es Mina, tu prometida.

translation.en: Mina Murray.
How...
How can I not recognize her face?
Well, you do look rather...
drained.
You look young.
And I owe it all to you.
translation.es: Y todo te lo debo a ti.

translation.en: Thanks.
Now, it's almost time for you to go, so three letters,
translation.es: Ya casi es hora de marcharte,así que escribe tres cartas,

translation.en: all to Mina.
The first saying you have nearly finished your work here
translation.es: En la primera, dirásque tu trabajo aquí casi termina

translation.en: and will be leaving within the week.
translation.es: y que te irás en una semana.

translation.en: The second saying that you have now completed your work
translation.es: La segunda dirá que terminaste tu trabajo

translation.en: and will be leaving the following day.
translation.es: y que te irás al día siguiente.

translation.en: And the third saying you have now left the castle and have arrived safely in--
translation.es: La tercera carta dirá que ya dejasteel castillo y llegaste a salvo a...

translation.en: What shall we say?
Bistritz, hmm?
I will send the letters at the appropriate times.
I'll forward the last one to Bistritz,
so it can be sent from there. But why-- Why would I do that?
translation.es: - para que se envíe desde allí.- Pero ¿por qué haría eso?

translation.en: So that Mina will know that you're coming home.
translation.es: Para que Mina sepa que vas a casa.

translation.en: But why would I write the letters in advance?
translation.es: Pero ¿por qué escribiría las cartascon antelación?

translation.en: Because the post here is very erratic.
translation.es: Porque el correo de aquí es muy errático.

translation.en: It's a precaution.
For whom? If...
If something were to happen to me, and those letters had already been sent--
translation.es: Si algo me ocurrieradespués de enviar esas cartas...

translation.en: Then Mina wouldn't think to come looking for you here.
translation.es: Entonces Mina no vendría a buscarte aquí.

translation.en: Do you want her to come here?
That's a baby.
-I can hear it crying. -There is no baby.
translation.es: - Puedo oír su llanto.- No hay ningún bebé.

translation.en: Write the letters or don't write the letters.
translation.es: Escribe las cartas o no lo hagas.

translation.en: It's up to you. I'm only thinking about Mina.
translation.es: Es tu decisión. Solo pienso en Mina.

translation.en: Now, if you don't mind, things to do.
translation.es: Si no te importa, tengo cosas que hacer.

translation.en: See you tomorrow evening. Leave the letters on the table.
translation.es: Hasta mañana por la noche.Deja las cartas en la mesa.

translation.en: The dates!
The dates for the letters.
How should I date them?
Well, let's see.
The 12th for the first. Uh, for the second, the 19th.
translation.es: El 12 para la primera.Para la segunda carta, el 19.

translation.en: And for the third...
What shall we say? 29th?
29th?
As good a day as any, Johnny.
Good night.
What if I leave? What if I leave this place right now?
translation.es: ¿Y si me voy...?¿Y si me voy de este lugar ahora mismo?

translation.en: No one is stopping you.
I don't have the strength.
[Dracula] No, I know.
It's not your fault, Johnny. You mustn't blame yourself.
translation.es: No es tu culpa, Johnny. No te culpes.

translation.en: [Harker] Please.
Please!
Leave the baby.
Johnny, there is no baby.
translation.es: - El bebé...- Johnny... ...no hay ningún bebé.

translation.en: [Harker] I knew in that moment that I had a choice.
translation.es: En ese momento supe que debía decidir.

translation.en: I had been told the span of my life, the limit of my existence: the 29th.
translation.es: Ya sabía que mi vida terminaría el día 29.

translation.en: Now, I could stay here dying piece by piece
translation.es: Podía quedarme allí, muriendo poco a poco

translation.en: till I found myself nailed into one of those boxes.
translation.es: hasta terminar encerradoen una de esas cajas.

translation.en: Or?
Or I could kill Count Dracula.
translation.es: O podía matar al conde Drácula.

translation.en: Not an easy task in the circumstances.
No, but I had certain advantages.
I should be fascinated to know what they were.
translation.es: Ansío saber cuáles eran esas ventajas.

translation.en: I was enfeebled and trapped.
-Well, indeed. -So, Dracula did not consider me a threat.
translation.es: - No me diga.- Drácula no me consideraba una amenaza.

translation.en: [Agatha] That's true, yes.
But on the negative side, you were enfeebled and trapped.
translation.es: Pero lo negativo esque estaba débil y encerrado.

translation.en: I had a potential ally,
one who could climb the castle walls.
One you couldn't even find.
translation.es: Un aliado al que no encontraba.

translation.en: That was because I was looking for the wrong thing.
I should've been looking for a map.
Of the castle? But there wasn't one.
That's what Dracula believed.
But in telling me that, he'd also told me where to find it.
translation.es: Pero al contarme eso,me dijo dónde encontrarlo.

translation.en: What did he say?
I missed it.
You did.
Then you're much quicker than me.
translation.es: Es mucho más listo que yo.

translation.en: I'm not quick.
I've always been slow.
But the thing is, when you're slow, you know you need to pay attention.
translation.es: Pero cuando eres lento,sabes que debes prestar atención.

translation.en: It's the clever ones who never listen.
You've read all this already in my account.
translation.es: Usted ya leyó todo esto por mí.

translation.en: [inhales] It's vague in certain crucial regards.
Continue, please.
[Harker] It occurred to me that night that Dracula said more than he intended.
translation.es: Se me ocurrió que Dráculadijo más de lo que quería decir esa noche.

translation.en: And more than he knew.
translation.es: Y más de lo que sabía.

translation.en: As he was a creature of the night, I had to wait until morning
translation.es: Él era una criatura nocturna,así que debía esperar hasta la mañana

translation.en: to test my theory.
The Count said there was no map,
translation.es: El conde dijo que no había mapas.

translation.en: but Petruvio was an artist,
and artists always wish to be understood.
translation.es: y todo artista desea ser comprendido.

translation.en: The castle was a monument to the architect's lost love
translation.es: El castillo era un monumentoal amor perdido del arquitecto

translation.en: and the sunlight to which he would never return.
translation.es: y a la luz del solque jamás volvería a ver.

translation.en: And what else is sunlight,
translation.es: ¿Y qué es la luz del sol...

translation.en: but the face of one's beloved?
translation.es: ...sino el rostro de la persona que amas?

translation.en: The path to the sunlight.
translation.es: El camino a la luz del sol.

translation.en: It was clear from the castle maps that Petruvio had created, within his design,
translation.es: Los mapas del castillo mostrabanque Petruvio había creado

translation.en: a system of shortcuts through the maze.
translation.es: un sistema de atajos dentro del laberinto.

translation.en: Hidden passages, possibly unknown even to Dracula himself.
translation.es: Pasajes ocultos,quizá desconocidos para el propio Drácula.

translation.en: How many times had I looked at that picture and not seen it?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces miré esa fotosin darme cuenta?

translation.en: Petruvio's wife was the sunlight,
translation.es: La esposa de Petruvio era la luz...

translation.en: and he stood guard at the door.
translation.es: ...y él hacía guardia en la puerta.

translation.en: He doesn't know I can get out of the box.
translation.es: Él no sabe que puedo salir de la caja.

translation.en: Don't tell him.
I won't.
Are you his friend now?
[stammering] No, I work for him.
I'm a lawyer from England.
I think he's made you his friend.
translation.es: Creo que te hizo su amigo.

translation.en: Why?
What's England?
It's where I'm from.
You know it. You're speaking English.
I learned it.
-How? -It tasted funny.
Tasted?
Once you are the Count's friend, all languages are the same.
translation.es: Cuando te haces amigo del conde,todos los idiomas son iguales.

translation.en: I'm hungry.
Was it you at the window?
You left the message?
I smelled you.
You're trapped here.
You're trapped too.
I want to help you.
[woman] Tell him I'm hungry.
He only gives me scraps.
translation.es: No me da más que sobras.

translation.en: Tiny little things.
Tell him I finished the last one.
translation.es: Dile que ya me comí el último.

translation.en: I finished it really quickly.
-[shouts] I'm hungry! -[gasps]
Look at it!
It is the sign of the cross.
translation.es: Es la señal de la cruz.

translation.en: The symbol of our Lord.
I know.
It's pretty.
You assumed, I suppose, that the cross would ward off evil.
translation.es: Supongo que asumió que la cruz alejaría el mal.

translation.en: Why are you smiling?
Your faith, I think it's touching.
What happened to yours?
I have looked for God everywhere in this world and never found him.
translation.es: Busqué a Dios en todas partesy nunca lo encontré.

translation.en: Then why are you here?
Well, like many women of my age, I am trapped in a loveless marriage,
translation.es: Como muchas mujeres,estoy atrapada en un matrimonio sin amor,

translation.en: maintaining appearances for the sake of a roof over my head.
translation.es: manteniendo las aparienciaspor un lugar donde vivir.

translation.en: Now then,
we proceed to your miraculous escape from Castle Dracula
translation.es: pasemos a su milagrosa huidadel castillo de Drácula,

translation.en: about which you have been so vague.
translation.es: sobre la que sabemos poco y nada.

translation.en: [Harker breathlessly] Somebody?
Please, help!
[Dracula] Johnny, this is interesting.
I've never seen it work with a baby before. Never.
translation.es: Nunca había visto que funcionaraen un bebé. Jamás.

translation.en: I think I might keep it on for a while.
translation.es: Creo que lo conservaré un tiempo.

translation.en: I hope this doesn't mean that I'm getting sentimental.
-[breathlessly] Why did you kill her? -[Dracula] Who?
because I wanted to see if she would die, I suppose.
translation.es: Porque quería ver si moría, supongo.

translation.en: Johnny, don't give me that look.
You were a child once. You know the feeling.
translation.es: Fuiste niño, sabes de lo que hablo.

translation.en: Didn't you break your toys apart to see how they worked?
translation.es: ¿No rompías tus juguetespara ver cómo funcionaban?

translation.en: You are a monster.
translation.es: - Es usted un monstruo.- Y tú, un abogado.

translation.en: And you are a lawyer. Nobody's perfect.
translation.es: - Es usted un monstruo.- Y tú, un abogado. Nadie es perfecto.

translation.en: A stake through the heart.
You see, sometimes the legends are right.
translation.es: Verás, a veces las leyendasestán en lo cierto.

translation.en: This is not one you can test too often, though.
translation.es: Aunque esta no puede probarsemuy a menudo.

translation.en: I only ever have three brides at a time.
translation.es: Solo tengo tres novias a la vez.

translation.en: Brides?
Brides, yes. I think that's the right word for it.
translation.es: Novias, sí.Creo que es la palabra correcta.

translation.en: You see, um... [clears throat] I am trying to reproduce.
Which, frankly, can be a bit of a challenge
translation.es: Y eso puede ser un tanto complicado

translation.en: when there is only one of you.
translation.es: si eres el único de tu especie.

translation.en: Ah, Johnny, you're just about done, aren't you?
She was a thirsty little thing,
and to think that she was going to keep you in that box all to herself.
translation.es: Ella era una criatura insaciable. Quería mantenerte en esa caja,todo para ella sola.

translation.en: Are you going to kill me?
Of course I'm going to kill you.
Why does death always come as such a shock to mortals?
translation.es: ¿Por qué la muerteescandaliza tanto a los mortales?

translation.en: [Harker] You took everything from me.
[Dracula] Well, of course I did.
You are the high road that leads me to England.
translation.es: Tú eres el camino que me llevaráhasta Inglaterra.

translation.en: Why England?
The people.
All those sophisticated and intelligent people.
translation.es: Toda esa gente sofisticada e inteligente.

translation.en: As I've been trying to tell everyone for centuries, you are what you eat.
translation.es: Llevo siglos diciendo lo mismo a todos:somos lo que comemos.

translation.en: [Dracula] Now...
if you don't mind, I need you to do one last thing for me.
translation.es: Si no te importa,necesito que me hagas un último favor.

translation.en: I haven't seen her in hundreds of years.
translation.es: Hace siglos que no la veo.

translation.en: Describe her to me.
[breathlessly] Who?
I've had artists paint her and poets capture her in words,
translation.es: Hice que fuera plasmadaen pinturas y poesías,

translation.en: and Mozart wrote such a pretty little tune, I...
translation.es: y Mozart le escribió una hermosa melodía.

translation.en: [clears throat] I really should have spared him, but...
What does a lawyer see?
Johnny, in my memory,
she sits behind the second highest peak at this time of year,
translation.es: ella descansa tras el segundo picomás alto en esta época del año,

translation.en: and she's quite red.
Is she red, Johnny?
Look for yourself.
But that will burn me to dust.
Good.
Fair enough.
Absolutely fair enough.
Will you put me in a box?
[Dracula] Keep your eyes on the sun, Johnny.
translation.es: No apartes tus ojos del sol, Johnny.

translation.en: It'll be the last time you see her.
translation.es: Es la última vez que lo verás.

translation.en: There is a box waiting for you in case you walk, yes.
translation.es: Hay una caja esperándotepor si caminas, sí.

translation.en: But most people I feed off just die, so you'll probably be fine.
translation.es: Pero casi todas mis víctimasmueren antes, así que estarás bien.

translation.en: Don't you see? An end is a blessing.
translation.es: ¿No lo ves? Un final es una bendición.

translation.en: Dying gives you size.
It's the mountaintop
translation.es: Es la cima de la montaña

translation.en: from which your whole life is at last visible,
translation.es: desde donde puedes ver toda tu vida,

translation.en: from beginning to end.
Death completes you.
Spare me.
How?
Answer me. Johnny, how?
How do I spare you?
How indeed, Mr. Harker?
Mr. Harker.
Mr. Harker,
you were about to explain how you escaped from the castle.
translation.es: iba a explicar cómo escapó del castillo.

translation.en: Yes.
-You've read my account. -Yes.
Perhaps it will help to refresh your memory.
translation.es: Quizá esto le refresque la memoria.

translation.en: [Harker] "Dracula will be served."
What is this?
"Dracula is my master. Dracula will be obeyed. Drac--
translation.es: "Drácula es mi amo. Obedeceré a Drácula.

translation.en: Dracula is the beginning and the end.
translation.es: Drácula es el principio y el fin.

translation.en: Dracula is all things. Dracula is God." What?
translation.es: Drácula es todo. Drácula es Dios". ¿Qué?

translation.en: I didn't write this.
When you were first brought here, you asked for a pen and paper.
translation.es: Cuando lo trajeron aquí,usted pidió papel y pluma.

translation.en: You were up all day and all night, and this is what you wrote.
translation.es: Estaba despierto día y noche,escribiendo esto.

translation.en: No. No, I thought I'd--
[Agatha] You thought you'd written an account of your stay at Castle Dracula.
translation.es: Creyó haber escritoun relato sobre el castillo.

translation.en: The only account you've given is the account you are giving right now.
translation.es: El único relato existentees el que está contando ahora.

translation.en: It's time to finish your story.
translation.es: Es hora de terminar su historia.

translation.en: [Dracula] Johnny, how?
How do I spare you?
How?
[Harker] Let me go.
You know why I'm going to England. You know that I'm going to kill people.
translation.es: Sabes por qué voy a Inglaterra.Sabes que mataré gente,

translation.en: A lot of them. As many as I need, and perhaps even more.
translation.es: mucha gente. Tanta como necesite,y tal vez más.

translation.en: I... [gagging]
-[choking] I won't. -You won't what?
Oh, you won't tell anyone about me, or try to stop me?
translation.es: ¿No le dirás a nadie?¿No intentarás detenerme?

translation.en: You'll just let me slaughter all those innocents, no questions asked? [laughs]
translation.es: ¿Me dejarás masacrar a todosesos inocentes sin cuestionar nada?

translation.en: Some lawyer you turned out to be, Johnny.
[breathlessly] I promise.
[sobbing] I swear.
All right, then.
Do that.
[Dracula] Swear.
I'm going to England to destroy everything and everyone you love,
translation.es: Iré a Inglaterra a destruir todoy a todos los que amas.

translation.en: but if you give me your word that you won't try to stop me,
translation.es: Pero si me jurasque no intentarás detenerme,

translation.en: I'll spare you.
-[softly] It's a trick. -Give me your word.
translation.es: - Es una trampa.- Dame tu palabra.

translation.en: [cries] No, you're going to kill me anyway.
translation.es: No, me matará de todos modos.

translation.en: [Dracula] Look me in the eye...
and give me your word.
Count Dracula,
I give you my word.
If you let me out of this place...
translation.es: Si me deja salir de este lugar,

translation.en: [shakily] if you let me live,
then I...
then I will do everything in my power to stop you.
translation.es: ...haré todo lo que pueda para detenerlo.

translation.en: Quite right.
That's my Johnny. [chuckles]
Welcome to the mountaintop.
I'm not breathing.
Sometimes you do, but I think it's mostly habit.
translation.es: A veces sí, pero creo que es un hábito.

translation.en: You have no heartbeat either.
I'm dead.
Undead,
but apparently not yet a vampire.
translation.es: Pero parece que aún no es un vampiro.

translation.en: One must cling on to any good news that there is.
translation.es: Hay que aferrarsea cualquier buena noticia.

translation.en: I do not serve Dracula.
No, but he's in your mind.
translation.es: No, pero está en su mente.

translation.en: The question is, why are you not in one of his boxes?
translation.es: La pregunta es:¿por qué no está en una caja?

translation.en: I don't know.
[Agatha] It's not something one ever anticipates asking,
translation.es: No es algo que uno preguntetodos los días,

translation.en: but what happened after you were murdered?
Oh, my goodness, that was quick.
Usually people have a lie-down first.
You're going to be a lively one, aren't you?
translation.es: Vas a ser uno muy inquieto, ¿verdad?

translation.en: You came back so quickly, that was impressive.
You even have the beginnings of a will of your own.
translation.es: Incluso empiezas a desarrollaruna voluntad propia.

translation.en: None of the others had much beyond hunger, but look at you go!
translation.es: Los demás solo se guiabanpor el hambre, pero mírate.

translation.en: Well, don't you see? This changes everything.
translation.es: ¿No te das cuenta? Esto lo cambia todo.

translation.en: Stay.
You could be my finest bride.
The others just became beasts, but you've kept your spirit.
translation.es: Los demás se volvieron bestias,tú conservaste tu espíritu.

translation.en: Johnny, you're like me.
I am not like you.
That's everything. That's...
It's all I remember.
But why did he scream? What did you do? Nothing. I did nothing. I...
translation.es: - Pero ¿por qué gritó? ¿Qué hiciste?- No hice nada, yo...

translation.en: I looked at him, and the next thing I remember was that I was here.
translation.es: ...lo miré y no recuerdo nada más.

translation.en: Yes, never mind that. -We know what happened next. -[Harker] No, I...
translation.es: - No importa, sabemos qué pasó después.- No, yo...

translation.en: I don't... I don't remember.
The river bore you out to sea,
translation.es: El río lo arrastró al mar

translation.en: and a fisherman found you, caught in their net.
translation.es: y un pescador lo encontróatrapado en su red.

translation.en: A drowned man walking and talking arouses a certain amount of curiosity,
translation.es: Un ahogado que camina y hablaes motivo de curiosidad,

translation.en: and you were brought to me,
babbling of a girl called Mina whose face you had forgotten
translation.es: balbuceando sobre una tal Mina,cuyo rostro había olvidado,

translation.en: and an evil Count who had stolen your soul.
translation.es: y un conde malvadoque le había robado el alma.

translation.en: Why was I brought to you?
I am known to have some expertise in the realm of witchcraft and the occult.
translation.es: Soy famosa por saberde brujería y ocultismo.

translation.en: You're a nun.
We can discuss my imperfectly suppressed fascination
translation.es: Podemos hablarde mi fascinación mal contenida

translation.en: with everything dark and evil another time.
translation.es: por lo oscuro y malvado en otra ocasión.

translation.en: For now, we will focus on why Dracula screamed.
translation.es: Ahora concentrémonosen el porqué del grito de Drácula.

translation.en: You were facing the sun.
Yes.
I have sought to find God all my life and never found a sign of him anywhere.
translation.es: Toda mi vida busqué a Dios y nuncaencontré una señal suya en ningún lado.

translation.en: Why now? Why you? Why him?
translation.es: ¿Por qué ahora?¿Por qué usted? ¿Por qué él?

translation.en: -I don't understand. -Then think!
[Agatha] Count Dracula fears the cross.
translation.es: El conde Drácula le teme a la cruz.

translation.en: He fears the symbol of our Lord.
translation.es: Le teme al símbolo de nuestro Señor.

translation.en: -The girl didn't. -Never mind the girl. She was nothing.
translation.es: - La chica no le temía.- Olvídela, no era nada.

translation.en: Dracula, prince among vampires, fears the cross.
translation.es: Drácula, el príncipe de los vampiros,le teme a la cruz.

translation.en: Do you understand what that means?
No, tell me.
God is real.
God is real, and I've found him at last.
translation.es: Dios es real y por fin lo encontré.

translation.en: [Harker] You have found the Devil.
translation.es: - Encontró al diablo.- Si se necesita al diablo

translation.en: If it takes the Devil to bring me to my Lord, then I say bring on the Devil!
translation.es: - Encontró al diablo.- Si se necesita al diablo para llegar hasta mi Señor,¡bienvenido sea!

translation.en: -I don't! -[Agatha] And why not?
God saved you for a reason, don't you think?
translation.es: Dios lo salvó por una razón, - ¿no cree?- No estoy salvado.

translation.en: I'm not saved.
I'm nothing.
Would Mina think that?
If she could see me, yes, she would.
translation.es: Si pudiera verme, sí, lo haría.

translation.en: Look at me.
I can't even remember her face.
Yes, I think you have proven that to our satisfaction.
translation.es: Sí, creo que lo ha demostrado con creces.

translation.en: [Agatha] Mr. Harker, I apologize for the deception.
translation.es: Señor Harker, me disculpo por el engaño.

translation.en: It was necessary she heard the story from your own lips.
translation.es: Era necesario que ella oyera la historiade sus propios labios.

translation.en: You may have forgotten your fiancée's face,
translation.es: Quizá hayas olvidadoel rostro de tu prometida,

translation.en: but I have not lost you yet.
translation.es: pero aún no te he perdido.

translation.en: Hello, Johnny.
Your eyes are still blue, at least.
translation.es: Al menos tus ojos siguen siendo azules.

translation.en: [Agatha] Having established your identity,
it was not difficult to trace you back to England and find your worried fiancée.
translation.es: fue fácil rastrearlo en Inglaterray encontrar a su angustiada prometida.

translation.en: I have a detective acquaintance in London.
translation.es: Tengo un detective conocido en Londres.

translation.en: Mina. [Mina] Did you really think,
even in your darkest moment,
translation.es: incluso en tu momento más oscuro,

translation.en: that I wouldn't come for you?
Did you think it was even possible that I could abandon the man I love?
translation.es: ¿Creíste que era posibleque pudiera abandonar al hombre que amo?

translation.en: I am no longer that man.
Dearest one,
we are to be married.
And so let me be plain,
who you are will always be my decision.
translation.es: quién seas o no siempre será mi decisión.

translation.en: Dracula is here.
How exciting.
Look after Mina.
[Harker] Mina.
Take it, please.
[Mina] Why?
[Harker] Because you're bleeding.
And I can't stand it.
Take it!
Mother Superior, on no account invite that creature in.
translation.es: Madre superiora, de ningún modoinvite a entrar a esa criatura.

translation.en: That is not a temptation with which I was struggling.
translation.es: No es una tentaciónque me haya costado resistir.

translation.en: What is happening? What is this?
We are under attack from the forces of darkness.
translation.es: Nos atacan las fuerzas de la oscuridad.

translation.en: Why would the forces of darkness wish to attack a convent?
translation.es: ¿Por qué las fuerzas de la oscuridadatacan un convento?

translation.en: Perhaps they are sensitive to criticism.
translation.es: Tal vez son sensibles a las críticas.

translation.en: I know who you are.
I've studied the legends.
I am fully aware that I am addressing Count Dracula.
translation.es: Sé que estoy dirigiéndomeal conde Drácula.

translation.en: The bats are a little noisy. Would you mind?
translation.es: Los murciélagos son algo ruidosos.¿Te importaría?

translation.en: Listen to me.
You are Jonathan Harker.
You would never harm me.
I know I am safe with you.
translation.es: Sé que estoy a salvo contigo.

translation.en: [Mina] It's me.
Look at me.
See me.
My blue-eyed Johnny.
Don't.
Oh, please, don't.
You don't need to do that.
I know you don't!
[screaming] Johnny!
The sun is down. You don't need to hide anymore.
translation.es: El sol ya se puso. No necesita ocultarse.

translation.en: Or are you too afraid to step from the shadows?
translation.es: ¿O tiene miedo de salirde entre las sombras?

translation.en: Please.
Let me.
-Johnny. -[Harker] Let me.
-Please. -[Mina cries] Johnny.
I'm sorry.
-Somebody help! Please! -[metal clangs]
This is devilry.
[Agatha] It's worse than that.
It is the Devil.
I don't know about you girls,
but I do love a bit of fur.
translation.es: pero a mí me encantan las pieles.

translation.en: Suffer unto me.
I'm not sure what legends you've been reading,
translation.es: No sé qué leyendas has leído,

translation.en: but bells don't have any effect on me.
translation.es: pero las campanas no me afectan.

translation.en: This one will.
Sister Agatha, have you been up to one of your secret projects again?
translation.es: Hermana Agatha,¿es esto otro de sus proyectos secretos?

translation.en: You'd better hope so.
[Dracula] This is exciting.
This'll be the most nuns I've had in one sitting.
translation.es: Nunca he asesinadotantas monjas de un tirón.

translation.en: Sisters, present arms.
I see my arrival was anticipated.
I was aware of the possibility.
Sister Agatha, what have you brought down upon us?
Cooee!
Hello!
Hello, ladies!
I don't want to worry you,
but the army of the faithful can't seem to look me in the eye.
translation.es: pero tu ejército de fielesme esquiva la mirada.

translation.en: You're naked, and they're nuns. It isn't your eye they're not looking at.
translation.es: Estás desnudo y son monjas.No es tu mirada lo que esquivan.

translation.en: [Dracula] Well, isn't anyone going to invite me in?
I've come a long way to see you.
Certainly not.
Sister Rosa, the key.
[whispers] You can't be serious.
I am more than serious. I'm completely confident.
translation.es: Hablo muy en serio. Estoy segura.

translation.en: [Dracula] How did you know that I was coming?
[Agatha] There's a man here you consider to be your property.
translation.es: Aquí hay un hombrea quien consideras tuyo.

translation.en: -My bride. -He is what drew you here, I think.
translation.es: - Mi novia.- Creo que él te atrajo hasta aquí.

translation.en: A bee can always find nectar.
And a trap always needs honey.
I don't think this is a trap.
Well, it wouldn't be a very good trap if you did.
translation.es: No sería una buena trampa si lo pareciera.

translation.en: Thank you, Sister.
Count Dracula, please attend my words with care.
translation.es: Conde Drácula,escucha mis palabras con atención.

translation.en: This is Saint Mary's Convent of Budapest, and you're not welcome here.
translation.es: Este es el convento de Santa Maríade Budapest, y no eres bienvenido aquí.

translation.en: You are most specifically not invited in.
translation.es: Del modo más explícito, no estás invitado.

translation.en: So, it's true, then.
-That's interesting. -[Mother Superior] What is?
[Agatha] A vampire may not enter any abode
translation.es: Un vampiro no puede entrar a una morada

translation.en: unless invited in. I wasn't sure about that one.
translation.es: a menos que lo inviten. No estaba segura.

translation.en: -A vampire? -You unlocked the gate
and you weren't sure?
-A vampire? -Oh, the iron wasn't keeping you out.
translation.es: - ¿Un vampiro?- La reja no te impedía entrar.

translation.en: You could have torn it apart like matchwood.
I could tear you apart.
Not from out there, you couldn't.
But what's stopping you?
A feeling? A force?
Is it physical or mental?
-Why do you need an invitation? -Do you expect me to tell you?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué necesitas invitación?- ¿Crees que te lo diré?

translation.en: Oh, I don't even expect you to know.
translation.es: Ni siquiera espero que lo sepas.

translation.en: A beast can follow rules. I don't expect it to understand them.
translation.es: Las bestias acatan reglas.No espero que las entiendan.

translation.en: I am more than a beast.
In what way?
But by your own account, you've been on this earth for hundreds of years,
translation.es: Según dices,llevas siglos habitando este mundo,

translation.en: and you can't even walk into a nunnery?
translation.es: ¿y ni siquiera puedesentrar a un convento?

translation.en: An ox could do it.
-How are you more than a beast? -You want me to show you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué te distingue de una bestia?- ¿Te muestro?

translation.en: Of course. I'm waiting.
Come here, come here a moment.
Come closer.
Look at them.
Look at your sisters.
-Armed and ready. -You're not looking.
translation.es: - Armadas y listas.- No estás mirando.

translation.en: I don't need to.
One of them. That's all I need.
translation.es: Una de ellas. Es todo lo que necesito.

translation.en: If just one of your pretty little army beckons me in,
translation.es: Si una sola de tus soldaditoshace el menor ademán de invitarme a pasar,

translation.en: I will tear your world to pieces,
and I will drink my fill.
Why would they invite you in? What do you have to offer?
-Eternal life. -Well, they have that already.
translation.es: - La vida eterna.- Ya la tienen.

translation.en: Thanks. Starting tonight,
translation.es: - Gracias.- A partir de esta noche,

translation.en: because the first one to invite me in stays at my side.
translation.es: la primera que me invite a entrarpermanecerá a mi lado.

translation.en: The others, I will tear apart, and, ladies,
translation.es: A las demás las destriparéuna por una y, señoritas,

translation.en: I will take my time.
One should never rush a nun.
translation.es: Nunca debes apresurarte con una monja.

translation.en: Your words are not welcome here.
translation.es: Tus palabras no son bienvenidas aquí.

translation.en: Well, if you find you're not tempted by my offer,
translation.es: Bueno, si no se sienten tentadaspor mi oferta,

translation.en: ask yourself this:
who is?
Who's weakest?
Who's the most afraid? Who will break first?
Is there still time for it to be you?
translation.es: Aún hay tiempo para que seas tú.

translation.en: What's that? What are you doing?
You wanted to know who's weakest.
translation.es: Querías saber quién es más débil.

translation.en: I'm showing you.
Oh, go on, help yourself.
There's a dog comes past here most days.
translation.es: Un perro viene aquí casi a diario.

translation.en: We often give it scraps.
Go on. You've come so far.
I'm sure you could do with a drink.
See, I'm not certain I see the appeal... of blood.
translation.es: No sé por qué les gusta tanto.

translation.en: [Agatha] Each to his own I suppose.
translation.es: Sobre gustos no hay nada escrito, supongo.

translation.en: Do you think provoking me is clever?
Yes, I do.
I want to learn about you.
I want to see the limit of your capability.
translation.es: Quiero ver el límite de tu capacidad.

translation.en: -It's the point of this experiment. -You have no conception,
translation.es: - De eso se trata este experimento.- No tienes idea,

translation.en: not the first idea...
Here, boy.
This is contemptible.
-You are without shame. -Be careful what you say to me.
translation.es: - Usted no tiene vergüenza.- Cuida tus palabras.

translation.en: Don't speak with your mouth full.
translation.es: No hables con la boca llena.

translation.en: She has earned the right to express her contempt, you know? We all have.
translation.es: Ella se ganó el derecho a expresarsu desprecio, como todas.

translation.en: Each of these women in front of you has turned her back on earthly pleasures,
translation.es: Cada una de estas mujeresha rechazado los placeres mundanos,

translation.en: resisting all forms of temptation.
We have freed ourselves of appetite
and, therefore, of fear.
translation.es: y, por lo tanto, del miedo.

translation.en: That is why you can't bear the sight of this.
translation.es: Por eso no soportas ver esto.

translation.en: It speaks of the holy virtue you do not possess.
translation.es: Habla de la santa virtud que tú no posees.

translation.en: It is goodness incarnate.
For a moment there, I thought you were clever.
translation.es: Por un instante,creí que eras inteligente.

translation.en: But no. No, that's not why I fear the cross.
translation.es: Pero no, no es por eso que temo a la cruz.

translation.en: Goodness has got nothing to do with it.
translation.es: La bondad no tiene nada que ver.

translation.en: [Agatha] So you say.
But how can a mere beast understand its own fear?
translation.es: Pero ¿cómo puede una bestiaentender su propio miedo?

translation.en: No one will invite you in, Count Dracula.
translation.es: Nadie te invitará a entrar, conde Drácula.

translation.en: We'll just pity you right where you are.
Who are you?
[Agatha] Finish your scraps. It's all you'll be getting tonight.
translation.es: Termina tus sobras. Solo eso recibirás.

translation.en: That's your name, isn't it?
Mother Superior used my name. You heard her.
translation.es: La madre superiora usómi nombre. La oíste.

translation.en: -You'll have to do better than that. -You're from somewhere else, I think.
translation.es: - Tendrás que esforzarte más.- No eres de aquí, me parece.

translation.en: Holland, right?
Well, you can tell as much from my accent, I think. I bid you good night.
translation.es: - Holanda, ¿no?- No es difícil deducirlo por mi acento. Te deseo buenas noches.

translation.en: [Dracula shouts] Helsing!
Van Helsing!
What is your interest in me, Agatha Van Helsing?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tanto interés en mí,Agatha Van Helsing?

translation.en: Who are you?
Your every nightmare at once.
An educated woman in a crucifix.
translation.es: Una mujer educaday armada con un crucifijo.

translation.en: [Agatha] He was a brave man.
He must have loved you very much.
What is he?
What is Count Dracula?
In life, he was a prince of exceptional learning and attainment.
translation.es: En vida, fue un príncipede sabiduría y proezas excepcionales.

translation.en: In death, I suppose you could say he's the best of the vampires.
translation.es: Después de muerto, podría decirseque es el mejor de los vampiros.

translation.en: -The best? -The most successful, I mean.
Most are feral, half-mad.
translation.es: La mayoría son salvajes, medio locos.

translation.en: They rarely last long, and yet, somehow,
Dracula has found a way to retain his human form
translation.es: pero Drácula ha logradoconservar su forma humana

translation.en: and intellect, more or less intact, for hundreds of years.
translation.es: y su intelecto más o menos intactodurante siglos.

translation.en: -By drinking blood. -[Agatha] Ah, they all drink blood.
Dracula has learned to do it well.
I think, by choosing his victims with the greatest of care.
translation.es: Elige sus víctimas con el máximo cuidado.

translation.en: Even in death, he has retained the discrimination of an aristocrat.
translation.es: Aun estando muerto,mantiene el criterio de un aristócrata.

translation.en: And so, he took my Johnny.
translation.es: Así que se llevó a mi Johnny.

translation.en: [Agatha] Come, the Mother Superior will want to lead us in prayer.
translation.es: Vamos, la madre superioraquerrá que oremos juntas.

translation.en: [Mina] I don't see the point in praying.
God is nowhere.
In which case, it is up to us to stop Count Dracula.
translation.es: En ese caso, depende de nosotrasdetener al conde Drácula.

translation.en: And we will, won't we?
Yes, we will.
[Mina] Goodbye, Johnny Blue Eyes.
I shan't ever love anyone else, you know.
Quite right.
[Dracula whispering] Johnny.
Johnny Blue Eyes.
Suicide doesn't work.
Don't you think the undead have tried that?
translation.es: ¿No crees que los no muertosya lo intentaron?

translation.en: [Dracula] Stake through the heart, that's fine,
translation.es: La estaca en el corazón funciona.

translation.en: but someone else needs to put it there.
I'm willing to give it a try.
Do you want me to do that?
Do you want me to kill you properly?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que te mate como es debido?

translation.en: All you have to do...
is invite me in.
[Mother Superior] We face danger.
We face evil,
which stands at the gate of our most holy sanctuary.
translation.es: que espera en la puertade nuestro santuario sagrado.

translation.en: God is with us, as we know.
God's love is eternal.
translation.es: El amor de Dios es eterno.

translation.en: This we know, too.
Tonight, in our most deadly hour,
translation.es: Esta noche, en nuestra hora mortal,

translation.en: do we think our God will remember us?
translation.es: ¿creemos que Dios se acordará de nosotras?

translation.en: Will he reach down and save us from death's shadow?
translation.es: ¿Bajará de los cielos y nos salvaráde la sombra de la muerte?

translation.en: No, he will not.
Where in our world is God to be found?
translation.es: ¿En qué parte de nuestro mundo está Dios?

translation.en: In our prayer?
In our song?
In our suffering? In our endurance?
Faith is not a transaction.
translation.es: La fe no es una transacción.

translation.en: You do not barter with the infinite.
translation.es: No se regatea con el infinito.

translation.en: You align with it.
So then, where do we find our God?
Sisters, I will tell you.
When you stand in the deepest pit,
translation.es: Cuando te hundesen el más profundo abismo,

translation.en: alone, without hope or help,
and yet still know right from wrong.
translation.es: y aún distingues el bien del mal.

translation.en: When there is only darkness and despair,
translation.es: Cuando no hay másque oscuridad y desesperanza,

translation.en: and yet you feel humming in your blood,
translation.es: y aun así sientes,latiendo con fuerza en tu sangre,

translation.en: the difference between good and bad.
translation.es: la diferencia entre el bien y el mal.

translation.en: When you are beyond rescue, or reward, or judgment,
translation.es: Cuando pierdes toda esperanzade rescate, recompensa o condena,

translation.en: and you still look evil in the face and say,
translation.es: pero aún puedes mirar al mala los ojos y decir:

translation.en: "No. This far, but no further.
translation.es: "No. Hasta aquí, pero ni un paso más.

translation.en: No!"
Whose voice is that?
Who's with you in that darkness?
Whose voice keeps you to the path?
Darkness and evil may seem compelling to us all,
translation.es: La oscuridad y el mal puedenser una tentación para todas nosotras,

translation.en: and I believe it is because in their presence,
translation.es: y creo que es porque, en su presencia,

translation.en: we can feel God in our hearts.
translation.es: podemos sentir a Diosen nuestros corazones.

translation.en: No, he will not reach down to save us.
translation.es: No, él no bajará a salvarnos.

translation.en: We will rise to meet him.
translation.es: Nosotras ascenderemospara estar a su lado.

translation.en: Let us pray.
She was clearing her throat.
I think it's fine now.
translation.es: Creo que ya se le pasó.

translation.en: So, ladies, who's next?
It's just that I have a very hard time deciding who's gonna be--
translation.es: Me cuesta mucho decidirquién será la próxima...

translation.en: Here's an idea.
Catch.
This will be the safest spot.
-[Mina] What is this place? -My workshop.
Here, where the sunlight hits.
translation.es: Aquí, donde entra la luz del sol.

translation.en: -It's nighttime. -In the morning.
translation.es: - Es de noche.- Cuando llegue el día.

translation.en: [Mina] It's not morning for hours.
[Agatha] I know.
[Dracula] Who's got it? Who's caught it?
Ah, we have a winner!
-What's that? -Jesus.
Jesus?
[Agatha] Bread.
Sacramental bread.
Oh, of course.
Nuns. You have those things which work, actually,
translation.es: Las monjas tienen esas cosas...que funcionan, de hecho,

translation.en: even though you will...
never guess why.
So I suppose I'll just have to control myself,
but between you and me,
controlling wolves is just so much more fun.
translation.es: controlar a los loboses mucho más divertido.

translation.en: It's a question of who you'd rather have tear you apart, I suppose.
translation.es: Es cuestión de quién prefierenque las haga pedazos.

translation.en: You have a choice, of course.
I'm undead, I'm not unreasonable.
translation.es: Soy un no muerto, no un irracional.

translation.en: Oh! Ow, that must have hurt.
It's all right. The screaming has stopped.
translation.es: Está bien. Ya no se escuchan gritos.

translation.en: I don't know how you could bear to listen to that.
I brought it on them.
Listening was my punishment. [sniffles]
Dracula's going to find us, isn't he?
[Agatha] Of course.
How is bread going to keep him out?
translation.es: ¿De qué servirá el pan contra él?

translation.en: -Sacramental bread. -[Mina] But how?
I don't know. None of the vampire legends make sense, and yet,
translation.es: No sé. Las leyendasde vampiros no tienen sentido,

translation.en: somehow, they are proving to be true.
translation.es: pero han demostrado ser ciertasde algún modo.

translation.en: He can't enter a home without being invited. Why not?
translation.es: No puede entrar a una casasin ser invitado. ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: The light of the day would burn him to death. Why?
translation.es: La luz del día lo quemahasta morir. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: He's terrified of the cross, and yet he's no believer.
translation.es: La cruz lo aterra, pero no es creyente.

translation.en: Somehow, these facts are all the same fact.
translation.es: De algún modo,todos estos hechos son uno solo.

translation.en: There's one thing that Dracula fears above all.
translation.es: Hay algo que Drácula teme más que nada.

translation.en: And to destroy him, we must discover it.
translation.es: Para destruirlo, debemos descubrir qué es.

translation.en: He got into the convent. How did he get in here?
Well, clearly, there was an invitation.
Then someone invited him.
[Harker] Mina?
[Mina shakily] I thought you were...
I saw you dead.
I couldn't stop him, Mina.
I let him inside.
-He's inside. -We know, Johnny.
translation.es: - Está adentro.- Ya lo sabemos, Johnny.

translation.en: He killed everyone.
Do not cross that line. You can't come any closer.
translation.es: No cruces la línea.No puedes acercarte más.

translation.en: [Mina] Let him in.
We cannot trust him.
He is strong, stronger than you think.
translation.es: Es más fuerte de lo que crees.

translation.en: -And if I'm with him-- -[Agatha] No one is strong enough.
translation.es: - Si estoy con él...- Nadie es tan fuerte.

translation.en: -No one. -Please!
-We can't just leave him out there. -Do not invite him in.
translation.es: - No podemos dejarlo ahí.- No lo invites.

translation.en: No!
Come here, Johnny.
Come to me.
I... am inviting you to be with me.
translation.es: Te invito a que estés conmigo.

translation.en: You don't know what you're doing. He let Dracula in. He will do it again!
translation.es: No sabes lo que haces.Dejó entrar a Drácula. ¡Lo hará de nuevo!

translation.en: [Mina] He won't. Will you, Johnny?
translation.es: No lo hará. ¿Verdad que no, Johnny?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm here with you,
and I will give you strength.
The two of us, together, we can be stronger.
translation.es: Los dos juntos seremos más fuertes.

translation.en: Johnny, your eyes...
He's inside.
Why aren't your eyes blue anymore?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tus ojos ya no son azules?

translation.en: [whispering] They're not my eyes.
Hello.
I've been dying to meet you.
